revised_title: X-ray Crystal Structure Analysis of Hexamethylenetetramine
tldr: The authors conducted X-ray studies on hexamethylenetetramine at different temperatures to analyze its crystal structure and molecular vibrations. They determined the atomic coordinates and vibration amplitudes, providing insights into the lattice vibrations and thermodynamic properties of the molecular crystal. This research helps in understanding the behavior of molecular crystals and their applications in various fields.
